product_details.description: Built for endurance, versatility, and comfort, the M720 Triathlon Mouse is designed to excel in a multi-device world. This wireless mouse for PC lets you power through tasks thanks to the Easy-Switch technology that allows seamless switching between 3 computers. Fly through documents and web pages using the hyper-fast scroll wheel, and hardly spare a thought changing batteries with 24 months of power on one AA battery. This Logitech mouse bluetooth features a large-sized sculpted shape that fits comfortably under your hand, and the keys are designed to withstand up to 10 million clicks. Connect this Logitech Bluetooth mouse to Windows or Mac using the compact Unifying Receiver or Bluetooth Smart technology. The black wireless mouse is suitable for a variety of devices and can be used as a wireless mouse for Chromebooks, a laptop mouse wireless, or a bluetooth mouse for iPad. Its cordless mouse design is compact, making it easy to carry as a wireless mouse for laptop users. Multi-Device Wireless Mouse: Move cursor, text, and files across multiple computers with Logitech FLOW; With this wireless Bluetooth mouse for laptop and PC, you can easily switch between up to 3 computers or laptops with the touch of a button Hyper-Fast Scrolling: Fly through long documents and web pages with a simple spin of the mouse wheel, featuring an additional instant-stop option with this Logitech wireless mouse Dual Connectivity: Connect this Bluetooth wireless mouse via the Logitech Unifying Receiver, which allows you to connect up to 6 compatible Logitech peripherals to this wireless computer mouse with just one USB receiver Comfortable Grip: Crafted for the right hand, this full-sized Logitech mouse wireless features a rubber body and a sculpted design for palm rest grip and comfort like never before Long-lasting and Versatile: Designed for endurance with 24-month battery life (1), M720 is a Logitech bluetooth mouse compatible with computers, laptops, tablets, Windows, macOS, Chrome OS, Linux, and iPadOS Brand - Logitech ** Color - Black ** Connectivity Technology - Bluetooth, USB ** Special Feature - Wireless ** Movement Detection Technology - Optical **

banner_details:
The banner features a tech-themed aesthetic with a dark, modern gradient background enhanced by semi-transparent curved shapes and overlaying circles that add depth and flow. At the center is the "product_image" object showcasing a sleek black wireless mouse. The “heading” layer prominently displays the product name in bold white, futuristic typography, followed beneath by a “subheading” in bright blue text introducing the product type. Positioned below the image is the “price” layer in white, clear digital-style text. A vibrant blue “cta_button” with the “cta” text in white invites users to act, balancing visual hierarchy and user engagement effectively.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Blue: `#1E2A38`
- Slate Blue: `#2C3E50`
- Mid Blue: `#34495E`
- Accent Blue: `#3498DB`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a Logitech mouse with a sleek, minimalistic design dominated by a deep matte black base (#1B1B1B), conveying sophistication and professionalism. Subtle dark gray tones (#2C2C2E) are used to differentiate the scroll wheel and buttons, creating visual depth through soft contrasts. The white logo and button markings (#FFFFFF) offer high visibility and branding elegance. Gentle lighting effects create a smooth color blend, enhancing the contours without harsh transitions. This restrained palette of black, gray, and white ensures clarity and focus. Ideal colors for an advertisement banner include: matte black (#1B1B1B), dark gray (#2C2C2E), and bright white (#FFFFFF).
